materials.raw_text:
Bi (Bismuth) - 140 g  
 Li (Lithium) - 210 g  
 Si (Silicon) - 90 g  
 Sm (Samarium) - 40 g  
 Y (Yttrium) - 80 g

sourcing.instructions:
Bismuth: Purchase from chemical supply companies or online marketplaces.  
 Lithium: Obtain from chemical suppliers or battery manufacturers.  
 Silicon: Buy from semiconductor suppliers or online.  
 Samarium: Available through rare earth material suppliers.  
 Yttrium: Obtain from suppliers of rare earth elements.

preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale.  
 2. In a clean, dry container, combine the weighed Bismuth, Lithium, Silicon, Samarium, and Yttrium.  
 3. Mix thoroughly with a glass rod or mechanical mixer until homogeneous.
